bug.short_desc: qx.ui.container.Scroll auto scrolls to top in Chrome when browser is zoomed out

long_desc.thetext:
Hi,
Regarding: qx.ui.container.Scroll and Google Chrome.
This bug appears in Google Chrome when the browser is zoomed out 1 level or more and you have some kind of Qooxdoo scroll area. The Qooxdoo scroll area will scroll to the top automatically. If you try to scroll down it will scroll back to the top again.
Reproduce steps: 1. Open this link with Google Chrome: http://demo.qooxdoo.org/devel/playground/#Table-ria 2. Scroll the table down a little bit (doesn't matter how much). 3. Zoom the browser out 1 level or more.
Result: The scroll bar in the table will scroll to the top automatically.
Thanks for the report. Currently, we don't support browser zoom and with that, I don't think we will fix that bug.
